## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 5 WCM PREMIUM Topreinigung, Topleistung: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 WCM Premium mit wassergekühltem Motor und Schlauchtrommel ist optimal bei Verschmutzungen auf Wegen, Terrassen und Autos geeignet. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle on top for easy transport. It has two wheels at the base for mobility. The body of the pressure washer is predominantly yellow with black accents, including the handle and wheels. ### Components: 1. **Main Unit**: - Color: Yellow and black - Features: Handle for transport, wheels for mobility 2. **Accessories**: - **Spray Gun**: Black, with a trigger handle for operation. - **Lance Attachments**: - Two different types of lances are shown, both black. - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns. - The other lance has a fixed nozzle, likely for more concentrated cleaning. This pressure washer setup is suitable for various cleaning tasks, offering flexibility with its different attachments. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a color scheme of blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. To the right of the number, there is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This text is centered within the yellow arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in the freelance online sector. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and confidence in the statement. The overall design is simple yet striking, aiming to convey a strong message of leadership and dominance in the market. ## Description The image is a logo for the "iF Design Award 2023." It consists of two main parts: 1. **Top Section**: - A red square with the white lowercase letters "iF" prominently displayed. The letters are bold and centered within the square. 2. **Bottom Section**: - A red rectangle beneath the square containing the text "DESIGN AWARD 2023" in white, uppercase letters. The text is aligned to the center and spans three lines, with "DESIGN" on the first line, "AWARD" on the second, and "2023" on the third. The overall design is simple and modern, using a bold red and white color scheme to create a striking visual impact. The logo signifies recognition in design excellence for the year 2023. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape resembling a speech bubble or a flag. Inside this shape, there is a circle of 12 yellow stars, which is a symbol commonly associated with the European Union. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written in a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Europe, emphasizing its origin within the European Union. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-460.0 ## Text Content - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907192
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901
## Ausstattung
Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
HD-Schlauch m 8
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [ ]

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 5 WCM PREMIUM

Topreinigung, Topleistung: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 WCM Premium mit wassergekühltem Motor und Schlauchtrommel ist optimal bei Verschmutzungen auf Wegen, Terrassen und Autos geeignet.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle on top for easy transport. It has two wheels at the base for mobility. The body of the pressure washer is predominantly yellow with black accents, including the handle and wheels.

### Components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - Color: Yellow and black
   - Features: Handle for transport, wheels for mobility

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Spray Gun**: Black, with a trigger handle for operation.
   - **Lance Attachments**: 
     - Two different types of lances are shown, both black. 
     - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns.
     - The other lance has a fixed nozzle, likely for more concentrated cleaning.

This pressure washer setup is suitable for various cleaning tasks, offering flexibility with its different attachments.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a color scheme of blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. To the right of the number, there is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This text is centered within the yellow arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in the freelance online sector. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and confidence in the statement. The overall design is simple yet striking, aiming to convey a strong message of leadership and dominance in the market.

## Description

The image is a logo for the "iF Design Award 2023." It consists of two main parts:

1. **Top Section**: 
   - A red square with the white lowercase letters "iF" prominently displayed. The letters are bold and centered within the square.

2. **Bottom Section**:
   - A red rectangle beneath the square containing the text "DESIGN AWARD 2023" in white, uppercase letters. The text is aligned to the center and spans three lines, with "DESIGN" on the first line, "AWARD" on the second, and "2023" on the third.

The overall design is simple and modern, using a bold red and white color scheme to create a striking visual impact. The logo signifies recognition in design excellence for the year 2023.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape resembling a speech bubble or a flag. Inside this shape, there is a circle of 12 yellow stars, which is a symbol commonly associated with the European Union. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written in a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Europe, emphasizing its origin within the European Union.

## Text Content

- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907192
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 17,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 389 × 901

## Ausstattung
Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
HD-Schlauch m 8
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
